net.canarymod.api.inventory

Interface Hopper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Inventory
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HopperBlock, HopperMinecart

    public interface Hopper
extends Inventory
    Interface for Hoppers, At the time of writing this includes HopperBlock and HopperMinecart.
    Author:
    Somners
